videos.title: Breaking News: Global Event
videos.description: Pakistan Ex-PM Imran Khan Granted Bail In State Gifts Case
videos.description1: A court in Pakistan has granted bail to former Prime Minister Imran Khan in the state gifts case, according to a report.\nn The Islamabad High Court (IHC) on Wednesday granted bail to former Prime Minister Imran Khan in a recent Toshakhana case. Justice Miangul Hassan Aurangzeb presided over the hearing and approved bail, contingent on the submission of two surety bonds worth Rs. 1 million each. The court directed Khan to cooperate fully with the trial court, warning that his bail could be revoked for non-compliance. The case involves allegations by the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) that Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi, illegally retained a luxurious Bulgari jewellery set, including a necklace, earrings, bracelets, and rings—received as a gift from a Saudi royal during their May 2021 visit to the kingdom. The FIA claims that the couple paid a significantly reduced price for the set, causing financial losses to the national exchequer.The IHC granted Imran Khan bail with a condition to appear before the trial court. Failure to comply or cooperate with the trial could lead to the revocation of bail. His wife, Bushra Bibi, had already secured bail in the same case last month.

Justice Miangul Hassan Aurangzeb presided over the hearing and approved bail, contingent on the submission of two surety bonds worth Rs. 1 million each. The court directed Khan to cooperate fully with the trial court, warning that his bail could be revoked for non-compliance. The case involves allegations by the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) that Imran Khan and his wife, Bushra Bibi, illegally retained a luxurious Bulgari jewellery set, including a necklace, earrings, bracelets, and rings—received as a gift from a Saudi royal during their May 2021 visit to the kingdom. The FIA claims that the couple paid a significantly reduced price for the set, causing financial losses to the national exchequer.The IHC granted Imran Khan bail with a condition to appear before the trial court. Failure to comply or cooperate with the trial could lead to the revocation of bail. His wife, Bushra Bibi, had already secured bail in the same case last month.

videos.title: Tech Update: New Innovations
videos.description: These groundbreaking innovations are going to blow people's minds in 2024. Welcome to WatchMojo, and today we’re counting down our picks for the most exciting and helpful pieces of technology that are expected to be released in 2024. Our countdown of the most anticipated tech innovations of 2024 includes LG’s Zero Labor Robot, Nintendo Switch 2, Rollable Phones, and more! Which tech innovation are you most looking forward to trying? Let us know in the comments!

videos.title: Sports Highlights: Australia v Pakistan | Third T20I | T20I Series 2024-25
videos.description: With Australia claiming the series in the first two matches, a chance to finish with a clean-sweeping victory was on the line in the final game.
